name: rw-shad
description: Add shadcn components to a RedwoodJS project

scripts.copypkgfiles: yarn cleannpx && cp README.md ./npx/ && cp package.json ./npx/
scripts.version:patch: yarn version patch && yarn tsx tag.ts
scripts.version:minor: yarn version minor && yarn tsx tag.ts
scripts.version:major: yarn version major && yarn tsx tag.ts
scripts.release:patch: yarn build && yarn version:patch && yarn copyforrelease && cd npx && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && yarn version:minor && yarn copyforrelease && cd npx && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: yarn build && yarn version:major && yarn copyforrelease && cd npx && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Tobbe Lundberg
